name: What the Golf? Sporty Sports!
summary:
The Olympics 2020 may be cancelled, but we are choosing to celebrate sports anyway! Remember the old saying: "All sports are golf and all golfs are sport!"

Compete in wacky takes on sports with more Soccer golf! Golf a golfer in a shark costume, golf a runner, golf some arrows or maybe even golf a horse!!

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: SPORTY SPORTS! - new content for WHAT THE GOLF? on Apple Arcade
